item.title: Recreating a Stethoscope – A Personal Project Close to Our Journey
item.description: We’ve carried stethoscopes as medical students for years — so we decided to build one ourselves. This project was both personal and technical: a Fusion 360 model that helped us learn about organic curves, modular parts, and how everyday tools are designed from the ground up.
